hero.title: Technical Interviews. Done Right.
hero.subtitle: Scale your hiring with expert technical interviews. Get standardized evaluations, AI-powered insights, and comprehensive reports in hours, not weeks.

about.label: About Lation
about.title: Transforming How Companies Hire Technical Talent
about.description1: Lation bridges the gap between companies and top technical talent through standardized, expert-led interview processes. We combine human expertise with AI-driven insights to deliver the most accurate candidate evaluations.
about.description2: Our platform supports recruiters and hiring managers with comprehensive technical assessments, detailed PDF reports, and data-driven recommendations that help you make confident hiring decisions.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Get comprehensive technical evaluations within 24 hours. Our streamlined process ensures you never miss a great candidate.

expert.title: Expert Interviewers
expert.description: Our certified technical interviewers have years of industry experience across various tech stacks and domains.

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.description: Leverage artificial intelligence to generate targeted questions and provide standardized, unbiased evaluations.

scalable.title: Scalable Process
scalable.description: Whether you're hiring one engineer or building a team, our platform scales with your needs effortlessly.

services.label: What We Offer
services.title: Complete Interview Solutions
services.subtitle: End-to-end technical interview services designed to help you hire the best talent efficiently.

interviews.title: Technical Interviews
interviews.description: Expert-led technical interviews tailored to your job requirements. Our interviewers assess coding skills, system design, and problem-solving abilities.

ai.title: AI-Powered Questions
ai.description: Our AI analyzes job descriptions to generate targeted technical questions, ensuring comprehensive and relevant candidate evaluations.

teams.title: Microsoft Teams Integration
teams.description: Seamless video interviews with automatic scheduling, calendar integration, and meeting recordings for later review.

reports.title: Detailed PDF Reports
reports.description: Comprehensive evaluation reports with skill assessments, scores, and hiring recommendations delivered within 24 hours.

stats.label: Our Impact
stats.title: Numbers That Speak
stats.subtitle: Trusted by hundreds of companies worldwide to deliver exceptional technical interviews.

clients.label: Trusted By Leaders
clients.title: Companies That Trust Us
clients.subtitle: From startups to enterprises, leading companies rely on Lation for their technical hiring needs.

testimonial.quote: Lation transformed our hiring process. Their expert interviewers and detailed reports helped us make confident decisions and hire top talent faster than ever.
testimonial.author: Jane Doe

contact.title: Let's Start a Conversation
contact.subtitle: Curious about how Lation can revolutionize your hiring? Drop us a message and our team will reach out to discuss your specific needs.

form.title: Get in Touch
form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your hiring needs, team size, or any questions you have...

footer.tagline: Transforming technical hiring with expert interviews, AI-powered insights, and comprehensive candidate evaluations.
